item.title: Hotfix 6.6.2 - 28th of May
item.description:
Hotfix 6.6.2 - 28th of May

Fixes

  • Fixed players not being able to progress in Weaves.
  • (Versus) Fixed recent balance changes unintentionally removing certain passive buffs from various careers.
  • Fixed a crash if a skeleton attacks an enemy that is exactly on top of the skeleton
  • Fixed a crash if a skeleton's target enemy is despawned the same frame that it starts its attack.
  • Fixed an issue where random poses wasn't used in the end screen when completing weaves
  • Fixed a bug where "reset" and "switch hero" descriptions switched places when crafting or salvaging items depending on if an item is selected or not.
  • Fixed a bug where Handmaiden's "Asrai Alacrity" talent didn't increase power level when not being the party leader.
  • (Versus) Fixed a crash when attempting to join someone from the main menu via Steam friends while they are hosting a Custom Game.
  • Fixed a bug where the player would end up in an infinite loading screen if they are in a friend's level, go to the Main Menu, and then join their friend via friend joining.
  • Fixed occasional enemy related crash when on very low framerate.
  • Fixed a bug where the cursor got stuck on screen until shutdown if having viewed a cinematic in the main menu.
  • Weave Skins are now available for Weapon Poses.
  • (Chaos Wastes) Added the ability to scroll through the list of boons while in the Pilgrimage map.
  • Patched a bug in the 'Neuter Ult Effects' mod that was breaking the Huntsman's career skill invisibility.
  • (Chaos Wastes) Fixed the weekly expedition reward skin not displaying its name properly.
  • The Well of Dreams fixes:
    • Fixed a crash when a players character despawns while inside a spotlight in The Well of Dreams
    • Fixed a client crash when walking into a spotlight area in The Well of Dreams just after losing connection to the host.
    • Fixed a spot where you could fall into a pit and get stuck.
    • Fixed a bug where you could turn the pages on the event books after the event was over.
    • Fixed a bug where interacting with the pages too fast will make the symbols look funky.
    • Fixed a crash involving shaders in the map.

item.title: Hotfix #68 (1.7.6) - Patch Notes
item.description:
Heya Everyone,
Hotfix #68 (1.7.6) is currently rolling out across our platforms. In the meantime, you can read the notes below!

Admonition Ascendant Fixes
  • Fixed some instances where the top part of the nurgle totem would fall straight through the totem body.
  • Fixed instances where some skulls on the totem would look low quality.
  • Fixed instances where sound emitted from the nurgle totem would stop during high intensity moments.
General Fixes
  • Fixed an issue where melee attacks failed to connect with destructible objects (e.g. Heretical Idols).
  • Fixed a crash occurring when dying in Vigil Station Oblivium.
  • Fixed a crash occurring when tagging enemies as they were being killed.
  • Fixed a crash occurring at the end of Rolling Steel.
  • Fixed an issue where Disrupt Destiny fails to show stacks in the HUD.
  • Fixed an issue where The Theatre of Castigation did not randomize the wave compositions.

item.title: JOIN/CREATE ISSUES FIXED
item.description:
WE'Z DUN FIXED IT LADZ!
We've tested this latest build thoroughly and it's zoggin' great üí™üëç

Please restart Steam to make sure Speed Freeks updates to latest

Things FIXED:
  • Not being able to join games properly, whether through Quick Match, or the Game Browser üéâ,
  • Not seeing all regions in the game browser üéâ
  • Not being able to create a game üéâ
  • Not being able to perform actions after a failed attempt at joining a game. Now the game will tell you if it's still processing a previous request
  • Servers now listed in order of lowest ping in the Game Browser
Cheers for your patience with the game being pretty broken üõ†Ô∏è
Obviously it was a pretty messy launch with these unforeseen connection issues popping up, but honestly we've had a really quick response to it thanks to our lead programmer (and only networking expert), the Wired QA testing team, and our community members for helping us test too.


Issues still happening:
  • Performance issues/stuttering when using Full Screen Windowed mode in the display settings.
    Workaround: Please instead use WINDOWED mode with your native resolution, or try FULLSCREEN mode instead,
  • Fatal error crashes. We've done some work on this so hopefully it's better, but these are the types of deep crashes that are hard to reproduce and diagnose. We'll continue to work on it
    Note: try to run as few things in the background when playing the game as possible
  • Game browser can sometimes - but rarely - show nothing, or a loading icon
    Please just restart the game if this happens, and try not to refresh the game browser constantly or it will bug out
  • There's an issue with servers using the same name and it confusing the game,
What's coming soon‚ùì
  • Improvements to team balancing and team switching,
  • Improvements to hit reg üôè
  • Vehicle balance improvements
  • General improvements and fixes
  • Warbands, which are like a clan/club feature. This was supposed to be in for launch but didn't make it in time.
  • looking into reimplementing some kind of **party system** (previous one died with the conversion of the multiplayer backend. You can join games with friends through the game browser in the meantime though)
  • Upcoming roadmap of potential features and content
Thanks for sticking with the game everyone. Been chaos the past couple days but we've now nailed it we think.

Happy RACIN', STUNTIN' and KRUMPIN'!
